fashion_dress_58.name: Silken Adornment
fashion_dress_58.description: Screaming pumpkin puppets in a lively masquerade. Wear it to shine in the spotlight on the stage or vanish into the night, leaving behind only a trace of crimson and a whispering breeze.
fashion_dress_58.source: Obtained from the Silken Adornment event

fashion_dress_60.name: Lord of Sacred Snow
fashion_dress_60.description: As the bell of the frosty dawn chimes, the castle gates open slowly, and the crowd ascends the steps to celebrate. Who shall be crowned upon the throne and underneath the sacred snow?

fashion_dress_59.name: Edge of Daylight
fashion_dress_59.description: Golden threads outline the horizon at sunrise, and pink crystals freeze the clouds at sunset. The daylight is so blinding that only for a moment near the edge of the earth do humans dare to look directly at it.

fashion_dress_55.name: Seabreeze Whispers
fashion_dress_55.description: In the scorching summer heat, strolling on the beach, the swaying veil brings the midsummer vibes.
fashion_dress_55.source: Obtained from the Seabreeze Whispers event

fashion_dress_56.name: Play in Time
fashion_dress_56.description: Hand me just one game token, and I'll take you on a day-long adventure!
fashion_dress_56.source: Obtained from phase 12 of the Pass.

fashion_dress_57.name: Elite Grandeur
fashion_dress_57.description: The next expedition is on the horizon. With the finest attire dressed and your spirit high, let's get ready to set forth!

fashion_dress_54.name: Dimensional Leap
fashion_dress_54.description: Onward to a new world, and a new fantasy journey begins!
fashion_dress_54.source: Obtained from the pre-order gift pack.

fashion_dress_47.name: Purple Fantasy
fashion_dress_47.description: Purple symbolizes luck and wealth. Does that mean more chests await?
fashion_dress_47.source: Obtained from the Cyber Friday gachapon event

fashion_dress_48.name: Retro Revival
fashion_dress_48.description: Seasons come and go, yet sentiments remain everlasting. During a beautiful spring afternoon, why not enjoy a nice excursion?
fashion_dress_48.source: Obtained from phase 8 of the Pass.

fashion_dress_49.name: Black & White
fashion_dress_49.description: Polar opposites can come together in celebration, singing and dancing to the same tune.
fashion_dress_49.source: Obtained from the Black & White gachapon event.

fashion_dress_46.name: Spring Splendor Attire
fashion_dress_46.description: Jade shines, in golden rays. Spring dress, made of silken threads.
fashion_dress_46.source: Obtained from the Spring Splendor Attire event

fashion_dress_44.name: Wonderful Night
fashion_dress_44.description: Gather 'round with your friends and spend a warm winter's night together!

fashion_dress_43.name: Reflected Whispers
fashion_dress_43.description: Meet a brilliant future decorated with gold flakes.
fashion_dress_43.source: Obtained from the Reflected Whispers event

fashion_dress_42.name: Noir
fashion_dress_42.description: Rational thinking and wild imagination are both essential.
fashion_dress_42.source: Obtained from phase 7 of the Pass.

fashion_dress_41.name: Wild Beat
fashion_dress_41.description: Shaking up the dunes with might, rock and roll will never die.

fashion_dress_40.name: Dynamic Youth
fashion_dress_40.description: Rebelliousness and the pursuit of Individuality can't be suppressed. It should be flaunted!

fashion_dress_39.name: Rosy Banquet
fashion_dress_39.description: On a day when real ghosts and fiends can blend in with the festive crowd unnoticed, put this on and attend a costume party that smells like danger...

fashion_dress_38.name: Dreamy Phantom
fashion_dress_38.description: An outfit that is both mysterious and romantic in a dark tone blended with black and dark green. It's undoubtedly a trendsetter.

fashion_dress_37.name: Dawn
fashion_dress_37.description: Go far away to witness the miracle
fashion_dress_37.source: Obtained from phase 5 of the Pass.

fashion_dress_36.name: Race the Wind
fashion_dress_36.description: Youth is to be bold and do the unthinkable.
fashion_dress_36.source: Obtained from the Race the Wind event

fashion_dress_35.name: Academy Era
fashion_dress_35.description: Vows of the past are like the colorful bookmarks in that textbook.

fashion_dress_34.name: Clear Rainbow
fashion_dress_34.description: With a summertime mood like this, every day should be spent in joy.

fashion_dress_33.name: Seaside Vacation
fashion_dress_33.description: It's time to kick back and relax! I heard that Banges is having a Graceday Celebration event...

fashion_dress_32.name: Silent Wings
fashion_dress_32.description: I witnessed the battleship burning on the fringe of Orion.

fashion_dress_31.name: Fluffy Party
fashion_dress_31.description: This is the Fluffy Party! A furry look is the ticket!

fashion_dress_29.name: Fantasy
fashion_dress_29.description: Descend from the firework-filled sky, and rise from the soul of music. Dance the first delicate steps toward the golden age of fantasy.

fashion_dress_26.name: Starlight
fashion_dress_26.description: Upon wearing this dress, a sense of mission will arise... one that pushes the wearer to work hard all day and night to perform official duties.

fashion_dress_25.name: Desert Aurora
fashion_dress_25.description: Put away your tired body and wear a coat of rough gravel. Welcome to this land of sand.

fashion_dress_18.name: Wasteland
fashion_dress_18.description: Marketed as both "gorgeous and dangerous," this outfit marks a breakthrough in the designer's craft, inspired by classical design.

fashion_dress_17.name: Forget Me Not
fashion_dress_17.description: An outfit suitable for extremely high-temperature environments. Provides adventurers with only the most basic shelter.

fashion_dress_16.name: Rising Gale
fashion_dress_16.description: Exhibit a sporty style that matches your youthfulness and vitality!

fashion_dress_15.name: Machine Era
fashion_dress_15.description: In a world where human modification becomes increasingly commonplace, the intersection of function and fashion becomes all the more important, as well.

fashion_dress_14.name: Operation: Streamer
fashion_dress_14.description: An experiment in both fashion and technology, featuring optical cloaking materials inlaid in the cloth and decorated with suspension components.

fashion_dress_13.name: Sunbeam Voyager
fashion_dress_13.description: Prioritizing functionality above all, this lightweight garment is equipped with a buckle for carrying additional items‚Äîa popular choice among those with more itinerant lifestyles.

fashion_dress_12.name: Nightwalk
fashion_dress_12.description: A prominent fashion designer's first foray into creating combat attire. Aside from being fashionably relevant, the torso is also equipped with ultra-thin alloy armor plating.

fashion_dress_1.name: Scavenger Outfit
fashion_dress_1.description: A simple and practical outfit for scavengers.

fashion_dress_19.name: Absolute Order
fashion_dress_19.description: A suit designed in accordance with the uniform of a governmental department before the Cataclysm. Effects a dignified and serious air.

fashion_dress_9.name: Conqueror
fashion_dress_9.description: A lightweight and durable adventurer's suit with plenty of pockets. The best choice for long-distance travel.

fashion_dress_2.name: Universal Work Clothes
fashion_dress_2.description: Warm, light, and breathable work clothes. Suitable for areas with minimal temperature change.

fashion_dress_10.name: Last Stand
fashion_dress_10.description: Geared toward mobility-minded adventurers, this outfit completely abandons any protective design considerations.

fashion_dress_5.name: Visitor in the Snow
fashion_dress_5.description: A cold-resistant combat suit with powerful heat preservation functionality. Can resist low temperatures in severely cold regions.

fashion_dress_50.name: Innarsian Fashion
fashion_dress_50.description: Formalwear which introduces classical elements on top of Innarsian design.
fashion_dress_50.source: Obtained from the Innarsian Fashion gacha pool

fashion_dress_51.name: Jade Elegance
fashion_dress_51.description: Serving to honor the techniques of ancient times, the embroidery of a classical painting on this article of clothing is simple, yet endlessly elegant.
fashion_dress_51.source: Obtained from the Jade Elegance event.

fashion_dress_52.name: Searching in the Crowd
fashion_dress_52.description: Looking back inadvertently, I noticed that you stood out among the crowd.
fashion_dress_52.source: Obtained from phase 10 of the Pass.

fashion_dress_53.name: Starry Cruise
fashion_dress_53.description: A light fabric mixed with leather and metal accents, this outfit gives off the freedom of going on a long journey with no luggage.
fashion_dress_53.source: Obtained from the Starry Cruise event.

fashion_dress_11.name: Desperado
fashion_dress_11.description: A rough and wild style, designed for adventurers who like to show off their personality.

fashion_dress_3.name: Wastelands Wanderer
fashion_dress_3.description: The first combat suit with a split upper and lower design, breaking the shackles of tradition. However, the exposed torso has proved to be a polarizing aspect among critics.

fashion_dress_6.name: Roamer
fashion_dress_6.description: The Hykros suit made of a material that maintains a constant temperature. Can keep you warm while protecting you from the sun. A sensible choice for travelers.

fashion_dress_7.name: The Mission
fashion_dress_7.description: Combat attire that boasts excellent malleability, as well as an ergonomic design that perfectly conforms to human skin.

fashion_dress_8.name: Star Sand
fashion_dress_8.description: Combat attire that boasts excellent malleability, as well as an ergonomic design that perfectly conforms to human skin.

fashion_dress_21.name: Midnight
fashion_dress_21.description: Danger and opportunity lie ahead. Let us step into that night and go on an adventure.

fashion_dress_22.name: Era
fashion_dress_22.description: The core design concept of this casual sportswear is "rebellion, passion, and showiness." Those who see this can't help remembering the times before they moved to Aida on the Distant Beacon.

fashion_dress_23.name: Early Sakura
fashion_dress_23.description: An outfit made for the early spring out of soft fabrics, as soft as cherry blossom petals slowly floating down onto one's shoulders.

fashion_dress_24.name: Desert Exploration
fashion_dress_24.description: An outfit that combines practicality and comfort. Suitable for exploration in the desert.

fashion_decoration_27.name: Goggles
fashion_decoration_27.description: Wear them and be transformed into the talk of the town!

fashion_decoration_26.name: Demon Doctor
fashion_decoration_26.description: Are you my test subject for today?

fashion_decoration_4.name: Red Heart Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_4.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_5.name: Pirate Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_5.description: Sorry, I really don't know how to draw bones.

fashion_decoration_11.name: Feast
fashion_decoration_11.description: This mask that covers your face is an invitation to the feast. Come and dance!

fashion_decoration_28.name: Black Goat Horns
fashion_decoration_28.description: If sheep go to heaven, where do goats go?

fashion_decoration_29.name: White Gauze Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_29.description: Originally used as a medical eyepatch, it somehow became a popular fashion accessory. Wearing it supposedly makes you look cooler, which adds to its popularity.

fashion_decoration_31.name: Black Eye Band
fashion_decoration_31.description: This type of eyewear shot up in popularity after the superstar Udamu was seen wearing them and has no shortage of imitators... But can you really see that well after putting them on?
fashion_decoration_31.source: Apex League - Star General Rank Results

fashion_decoration_32.name: Particle Lens
fashion_decoration_32.description: Features an ultra-high-performance microcomputer that can take photos according to your visual distance and intraocular imaging, and analyzes the composition and structure of all objects in front of you.
fashion_decoration_32.source: Apex League - Battle Lord Rank Results

fashion_decoration_33.name: Windchaser Hairband
fashion_decoration_33.description: A fashionable hairband that is very popular in Banges. Sporting a simple shape as well as unique patterns and colors, this item sells out almost as soon as it hit the shelves.

fashion_decoration_34.name: Admiral's Shades
fashion_decoration_34.description: Originally made for seafarers, these shades suddenly became popular in Banges due to their unique shape and color, and later a symbol of high fashion.

fashion_decoration_35_bilibili.name: ACE Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_35_bilibili.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_36_haoyou.name: Swimmer's Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_36_haoyou.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_37_jiuyou.name: Series 9 Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_37_jiuyou.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_38_oppo.name: Progressive Professor
fashion_decoration_38_oppo.description: Are you my test subject for today?

fashion_decoration_39_huawei.name: White Gauze Eyepatch
fashion_decoration_39_huawei.description: Originally used as a medical eyepatch, it somehow became a popular fashion accessory. Wearing it supposedly makes you look cooler, which adds to its popularity.

fashion_decoration_40_tap.name: Dr. Tap
fashion_decoration_40_tap.description: Are you my test subject for today?

fashion_decoration_43.name: Disguise Sunglasses
fashion_decoration_43.description: So long as I'm wearing these sunglasses, no one seems to recognize me... Why is that?
fashion_decoration_43.source: Reach 85% Artificial Island Outer Island exploration

fashion_decoration_44.name: Steel Lizard Mask
fashion_decoration_44.description: I can't explain this to you, because I'm merely just a steel lizard hatchling.

fashion_decoration_47.name: Bubblegum
fashion_decoration_47.description: We've already secured it, so don't be afraid of blowing too much and breaking it.

fashion_decoration_48.name: Rolled Whistle
fashion_decoration_48.description: An affordable childhood memory toy. A lovely addition to parties as well.

fashion_decoration_50.name: Orange Eyepiece
fashion_decoration_50.description: It's capable of many things such as blocking impacts, analyzing battlefield data, protecting you from flashbangs, and more.

fashion_decoration_51.name: Pacifier
fashion_decoration_51.description: In this day and age, who out of all people isn't a baby?

fashion_decoration_52.name: Toot-Toot
fashion_decoration_52.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Spread the cuteness!

fashion_decoration_53.name: Nothing Happened
fashion_decoration_53.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Blushes hidden no longer!

fashion_decoration_54.name: Pile
fashion_decoration_54.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. This model is said to be the best-selling one.

fashion_decoration_55.name: Seal
fashion_decoration_55.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. The two colors on it suggest the conflict of dual personalities.

fashion_decoration_56.name: Construct
fashion_decoration_56.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. This face mask is in fact, a disguise for body components.

fashion_decoration_57.name: Hush
fashion_decoration_57.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Hush... Only silence from here on out now.

fashion_decoration_58.name: Cloak
fashion_decoration_58.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Conceal your true feelings of the moment.

fashion_decoration_64.name: Electric Wave Mask
fashion_decoration_64.description: Due to the influence of unknown electric waves, one can't help but put on this mask. It's time to set off in search of your own kind!

fashion_decoration_65.name: Monocle of Truth
fashion_decoration_65.description: Lies, hypocrisies, crimes... All these beautiful falsehoods are exposed through this glass.

fashion_decoration_66.name: Starry Glasses
fashion_decoration_66.description: I'm the brightest star in the kindergarten!

fashion_decoration_67.name: Radiant Glasses
fashion_decoration_67.description: Hot-selling glasses popular among entertainment venues in Mirroria. Supposedly can identify the songs being played and display their titles on the lens. That is just too cool!

fashion_decoration_68.name: Hanging Silk
fashion_decoration_68.description: There are always some tiny little things with no good values other than being watched.

fashion_decoration_69.name: Amplification Goggles
fashion_decoration_69.description: Looks familiar... Am I able to see the world in her eyes?

fashion_decoration_70.name: Grapes Bubblegum
fashion_decoration_70.description: Smells like grapes on the breath.

fashion_decoration_71.name: Sunshine Pacifier
fashion_decoration_71.description: Vibrant little sun! Grow up quickly!

fashion_decoration_75.name: Rock Helmet Mask
fashion_decoration_75.description: They are used to hiding all emotions.

fashion_decoration_76.name: Fawn Mask
fashion_decoration_76.description: Who's the pure and harmless fawn?

fashion_decoration_77.name: Deep Sea Shark
fashion_decoration_77.description: Listen carefully to the call of the deep sea and never refrain from diving into the future unknown.

fashion_decoration_78.name: Voice of Myth
fashion_decoration_78.description: You have received an interesting radio transmission! It's time to find out what's going on!

fashion_decoration_79.name: Proof of Nakya
fashion_decoration_79.description: A beautiful red headband, a proof of valor obtained by defeating Abyssant: Nakya.

fashion_decoration_80.name: Woofie Mask
fashion_decoration_80.description: Who wouldn't like such a cute woofie?

fashion_decoration_81.name: Hovering Scanner
fashion_decoration_81.description: Capable of scanning the surrounding area in real-time and providing alerts when danger is nearby.

fashion_decoration_82.name: Inlaid Gold Ornament
fashion_decoration_82.description: A phoenix-inspired ornament, meticulously crafted using ancient inlaid gilding techniques. When resonating with timestamp energy, it begins to hover and sway gracefully.

fashion_decoration_83.name: Nightmareguard Vizard
fashion_decoration_83.description: A mask that has been recast from Zhuyan's vizard. It's said that the wearer can negate bad omens.

fashion_decoration_86.name: Ring of Gluttony
fashion_decoration_86.description: An accessory made out of Taotie's armor. Wear it by electromagnetic adsorption.

fashion_decoration_87.name: Silver Beach
fashion_decoration_87.description: Summer sun is great, but you should keep those UV rays out of your eyes somehow.

fashion_decoration_88.name: Ring of Enlightenment
fashion_decoration_88.description: An honor from Hykros, it recognizes the Diamond Mentors who have provided the most assistance to novices!

fashion_decoration_89.name: Xingtian Wheel
fashion_decoration_89.description: After a thorough study, Zhen Gong now can confirm that this object is harmless to the human body. However, we can't yet fully understand its self-rotating energy supply. Some people suspect that it's bearing a part of Xingtian's power.

fashion_decoration_90.name: Lunar Together
fashion_decoration_90.description: To honor the festive season, Mirroria collaborated with renowned historians. Drawing inspiration from ancient celebrations of our homeland, our expert designers created this exquisite festive decoration.

fashion_decoration_91.name: Tiny Devil
fashion_decoration_91.description: Beware of the tiny devils lurking in the night. Watch your neck!

fashion_glider_2.name: Orion
fashion_glider_2.description: Tired of the Jetpack's look? It's time to add something new to your flight experience!

fashion_glider_3.name: Overwatcher
fashion_glider_3.description: The journey you once embarked on, and the places you struggled to reach have now become the scenery that you can overlook with a peaceful mind. And the next step is...

fashion_glider_4.name: Whitewing Meteor
fashion_glider_4.description: A new product from Hykros's Aerodynamics Research Lab. This Jetpack can only be obtained through limited means.
fashion_glider_4.source: Obtained from the pre-order gift pack.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_6.name: Panda Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_6.description: Don't take Mi-a's bag and eat it!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_7.name: Cutie Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_7.description: Cute as a button... Are you talking about Mi-a or her backpack?

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_8.name: Swimsuit Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_8.description: Don't forget Mi-a when going to the beach!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_9.name: Halloween Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_9.description: I'd like to turn you into a small pumpkin.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_oversea_1.name: Garuda Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_oversea_1.description: The inspiration for this came from the mythical giant bird Shelly came across in a mysterious ancient book. It looks to be a perfect match for the flying Mi-a.

fashion_medal_1.name: Bygone Phantasm Star
fashion_medal_1.description: A Commemorative Medal made of Diamonds, with the emblem of Bygone Phantasm in the middle. A reward exclusively for the first place player in a single Bygone Phantasm season.

fashion_medal_2.name: Gold Phantasm Medal
fashion_medal_2.description: A Commemorative Medal made of pure gold, with the emblem of Bygone Phantasm in the middle. A reward exclusively for the second place player in a single Bygone Phantasm season.

fashion_medal_3.name: Silver Phantasm Medal
fashion_medal_3.description: A Commemorative Medal made of fine silver, with the emblem of Bygone Phantasm in the middle. A reward exclusively for the third place player in a single Bygone Phantasm season.

fashion_medal_4.name: Star of Enlightened Mentor
fashion_medal_4.description: Its brilliant starry decorations, a symbol of the Diamond Mentor's status, serve as an accolade for their assistance to others.

fashion_medal_5.name: Star of Bright Mentor
fashion_medal_5.description: Its shiny golden starry decorations, a symbol of the Gold Mentor's status, serve as an accolade for their assistance to others.

fashion_medal_6.name: Star of Splendid Mentor
fashion_medal_6.description: Its shimmering silver starry decorations, a symbol of the Silver Mentor's status, serve as an accolade for their assistance to others.

fashion_medal_7.name: Origin of War Star
fashion_medal_7.description: A Commemorative Medal made of Diamonds, with the emblem of Origin of War in the middle. A reward exclusively for the first place player in a single Origin of War season.

fashion_medal_8.name: Gold Origin Medal
fashion_medal_8.description: A Commemorative Medal made of pure gold, with the emblem of Origin of War in the middle. A reward exclusively for the second place player in a single Origin of War season.

fashion_medal_9.name: Silver Origin Medal
fashion_medal_9.description: A Commemorative Medal made of fine silver, with the emblem of Origin of War in the middle. A reward exclusively for the third place player in a single Origin of War season.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_10.name: Reindeer Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_10.description: Just as described in so many tales, Mi-a had prepared her gifts long beforehand, and eagerly awaited the coming of that night.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_11.name: Bunny Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_11.description: This isn't Dolly! I wouldn't want to hug the wrong one!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_12.name: Garuda Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_12.description: The inspiration for this came from the mythical giant bird Shelly came across in a mysterious ancient book. It looks to be a perfect match for the flying Mi-a.

fashion_seascooter_2.name: Pigmentation
fashion_seascooter_2.source: Advance Mini Pelican to 5 stars to obtain
